setup: Install dependencies: npm install pannellum-react recharts framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge
Configure Tailwind with the custom colors and fonts defined above.
Ensure 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' are imported from Google Fonts in index.css.
specific_rules: Use 'pannellum-react' for the 360 view. If it fails, fallback to a static image with a 'View 360' button overlay.
For Sun Simulation: Create a 'TimeSlider' component. It should update a state 'time' (6-20). Calculate brightness (peak at 13) and shadow rotation based on this state.
Use 'recharts' for the Analytics page (LineChart for visits, PieChart for demographics).
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' and 'zod' for validation (standard practice).

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
